core.name: Comet Bless
core.description:
Leader Bonus:
Guider: Team gains 10% Max HP in battle.

subskills.name: Guider
subskills.description: Team gains 18% Max HP in battle.

core.name: Combo Skill: Comet Fall
core.description:
Attacks enemy with a double-kick, punting it into the air and then bringing it down.
Punt: 50% of ATK of Physical DMG.
Bring Down: 275% of ATK of AOE Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Switch: Neko Stomp
subskills.description: Switch entry unleashes a crushing slam, dealing 275% ATK of Physical DMG. Interrupting enemies causes 5s of Stun and inflicts 6 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: QTE: Aerial Helix
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered when an enemy is knocked airborne, dealing 375% ATK + 2,250.0 of Physical DMG. Last hit of the QTE stuns the enemy for 5s and inflicts 3 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: Gravity Freak
subskills.description: The 2nd strike of combo attacks and Neko Stomp deals an additional 1,125 Fire DMG against enemies with an unbroken Elite Shield.

subskills.name: Critical Mastery
subskills.description: Gain 40.0% Crit DMG at above 80% HP.

core.name: Neko-Charm!
core.description:
Activates Valkyrie's burst mode and consumes SP.
Burst: Consumes SP continuously to gain Attack Speed and Ignore Interrupt.
Consumes 20 SP (at over 100 SP) to activate and 10 SP/s afterwards until SP is depleted; max duration: 60s.

subskills.name: Valkyrie Impact
subskills.description: Burst activation stuns nearby enemies for 5s, deals 2,610.0 Physical DMG, and inflicts 6 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: Valkyrie Barrier
subskills.description: The team gains Ignore Interrupt and 100% DEF during Burst.

subskills.name: Valkyrie Charge
subskills.description: Charge up once every 12.0s. The next attack consumes the charge, stuns enemies for 5s, and deals 6 Stun Trauma.

core.name: Neko Cartwheel
core.description:
Quickly cartwheels away to evade enemy attacks. Can be performed twice in a row.
Time Fracture: Triggers a 3s Time Fracture upon Ultimate Evasion; CD: 15s.

subskills.name: Time Bender
subskills.description: Shortens CD of Time Fracture by 4.0s.

subskills.name: Temporal Flow
subskills.description: Additionally restores 5.0 SP for the team when Ultimate Evasion triggers Time Fracture.

core.name: Meteor Kata
core.description:
5-sequence Gun Kata.
1st Sequence: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
4th Sequence: 150% ATK of Physical DMG x2.
5th Sequence: 250% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Comet Kata
subskills.description: Physical DMG dealt by each sequence of the 4-sequence Basic ATK increases by 143.0.

subskills.name: Comet Break
subskills.description: When Basic/Combo ATKs breaks an enemy shield, additionally deals 220.0% ATK of Physical DMG against the target.

subskills.name: Comet Impact
subskills.description: When Basic ATK interrupts an enemy, there is a 40.0% chance to stun them for 5s and inflict 3 Stun Trauma. CD: 7s.
